author: sussman
msg: * svnadmin_tests.py (test_create):  this function was half-written,
and not working over ra_dav due to the fact that it was
circumventing the sbox.build() API.  Put a ### todo comment in there
instead.

author: sussman
msg: Fix a bug in Garrett's r1264 commit.
(This was causing commit_test #15 to fail, but this test was written
only to expect generic failure, so it still passing, so it looked as
though 'make check' was passing.  If you ran commit_tests.py by hand,
though, you'd see the extra stderr output.  The moral of the story is
that commit_test #15 should be using run_and_verify_commit() to look for
a *specific* expected errorstring.  Anyone wanna fix it?)
* copy.c (wc_to_wc_copy): make sure it's actually a file you're
passing to apr_file_remove.  :-)

author: sussman
msg: Okay, I think somebody editing build.conf must have accidentally
*un*-disabled trans_tests.py when we run 'make check'.  There's only
one function written in there, and it doesn't work at all.  I don't
think it has ever worked, or has ever been run!
Let's get it working, then.
* trans_tests.py (keywords_from_birth):  shorten docstring please, so
it prints nicely when running '*.py list'.  Change 'Sending' verbs
to 'Adding'.  Set the keyword properties *after* scheduling the
files for addition.

author: kevin
msg: Partially fix Issue 624.  See the issue for details.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/fetch.c (fetch_dirents): take a recurse parameter,
only PUSH_SUBDIRS if it is true.
(svn_ra_dav__do_checkout): Pass recurse parameter down to fetch_dirents.
Continue looping until sentinel is reached to ensure that close_directory is
called on the directory.

author: kevin
msg: Ignore some things.
* . - Ignore tags
* ./subversion/tests/libsvn_subr - Ignore subst-test
* ./subversion/tests/libsvn_wc - Ignore translate-test, don't ignore "this".
